content: dcr x8 sc2 = 45 row 40 single_crochet all the way around = 45 row 41 single_crochet 3 dcr x 9 = 36 row 42-43 single_crochet all the way around = 36 row 44 single_crochet 1 dcr sc2 dcr x8 sc2 = 27 row 45 single_crochet all the way around = 27 row 46 single_crochet dcr x 9 = 18 row 47-48 single_crochet all the way around = 18 row 49 single_crochet in each opposing stitch to close the body tail row 1 chain 13 turn half_double_crochet in every stitch starting in the second from the hook slip_stitch in the next stitch at the base = 12 row 2 half_double_crochet in blo x 9 chain 1 turn leaves three stiches undone = 9 row 3 half_double_crochet in blo x 9 slip_stitch in the second stich at the base = 9 row 4 half_double_crochet in blo x 7 chain 1 turn leaves 3 stitches undone = 7 row 5 half_double_crochet in blo x 7 slip_stitch in the base = 7 row 6 half_double_crochet in blo x 7 chain 3 turn row 7 half_double_crochet in the second chain from your hook half_double_crochet in the next chain half_double_crochet in blo x 7 slip_stitch in the base row 8 half_double_crochet in blo x 9 chain 4 turn row 9 half_double_crochet in the second chain from hook half_double_crochet in the next 2 chain half_double_crochet in blo x 9 slip_stitch in the base fins row 1 chain 15 turn half_double_crochet in the second chain from your hook half_double_crochet in the next 12 chain chain 1 turn leaves one undone chain = 13 row 2 half_double_crochet in blo x 10 chain 1 turn row 3 half_double_crochet in blo x 10 chain 1 turn row 4 half_double_crochet in blo x 7 chain 1 turn row 5 half_double_crochet in blo x 7 chain 1 half_double_crochet in each row until you reach the start pull your starting yarn through the loop and tie off
